CatDescriptText: Mrs. Lorraine Evans, 820 Francis Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 23, 1957, pg. 10 with question: "Do you think Negroes in Pittsburgh use their economic power wisely?" answer reads: "I had not thought about it seriously. Speaking of individuals that I know, I know that they use it wisely, especially those with kids."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lorraine Evans wearing light colored hat and, holding bag in left hand, standing on sidewalk with  young boy and girl, in front of metal fence and sign
